about_the_game:
Spectral Prison is a horror game where you are stuck in a loop in a house that seems to change at the whims of a sinister Warden out to make sure you can never get out.

Trapped 

David Echo wakes in a dimly lit bedroom, the only familiar place in a house that feels eerily distorted. Your goal? Find the keys to unlock the doors and escape this spectral prison. But beware, the house is filled with terrifying surprises.

Think you've finally escaped? Think again. A sinister warden watches your every move, ready to capture you and send you to an even more terrifying dimension.

Warden's Wrath

The warden does not like you beating his games and will try to make every loop harder, trying to make you quit and stay in his prison.

Ever changing house

Every time you return, the house alters itself. Key positions change as the warden tries to keep you locked in.

name: Spectral Prison Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 4570k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Trapped in an endless cycle, David Echo must navigate haunted houses and terrifying dimensions to escape the sinister warden. Find hidden keys, avoid monsters, and break free from the nightmare. Can you survive?
